#include<iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{

    int t,n;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
              cin>>n;
              int a,b;
              a=0;
              b=1;
              int ans=0;
              int count=0;
              while(ans<n)
              {
                  ans=a+b;
                  a=b;
                  b=ans;
                        count++;
              }
              //cout<<cnt<<endl;
              n=n%(count+1);
              cout<<n%8<<"\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
